website_summaries.verdict: A highly convenient, hypoallergenic eye makeup remover pads soaked in gentle Micellar water.
pros: Great for travel or a lazy night
Micellar water is non-oily and non-irritating
Reduces the need for a separate pad or cotton ball
cons: Pads are small but thickness and moistness make up for size

customer_reviews.title: The best in the world.
customer_reviews.text: Best eye makeup remover pads in the world. not even slightly an overstatement. I've tried brands in 4 different countries and multiple multiple cities. I ended up importing these from Canada to the US consistently until they finally were added to amazon. I have a stock of 10 at all times. All my friends want them now. No residue, they don't dry out, they're soft and gentle, I can TOUCH MY EYES WITH THEM, comfortable to use on entire face if you're lazy or traveling. YOU CANNOT GET BETTER. end of.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: No irritating oils ir chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for gentle Micellar water when I found these pads. I use them on my eyes and also for other makeup removal. They easily and gently take off eye makeup, including long wear mascara and eyeliner, without a lot of rubbing, quickly and cleanly. Where some micellars have a distinctively oily aftermath, these do not, so I don’t have to wipe or wash again to get residue off. The pads have two distinct sides where one side has texture to help with removal. I hold one these on my use for a few seconds and then gently wipe downward. Most everything comes off in the first swipe. I haven’t had any eye irritation with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good stuff. It does a good job of taking make-up off and a pretty good job with the water proof stuff. I am used to Lancome which honestly is the gold standard for removing anything, even the red lip stain from all over my 5 year olds face lol. This doesn't work as well as that but Lancome doesn't travel well either so I think this is a good back up choice for when I am travelling or just plain out of cotton pads. I like it and if I didn't use water proof mascara I might just switch full time to it. It is certainly more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adetona

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Makeup Removers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite. They remove eye makeup easily and do not leave an oily residue like other brands (or like the non-oil free version of this brand). Non irritative for sensitive under eye and eye lid areas.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used these after cleansing my face and was blown away! It removed all traces of waterproof mascara and gel eyeliner. No more dark smudges under my eyes! Not one speck of mascara remained. This is the first product I've ever used that was able to completely remove the mascara. I use one pad for both eyes (one side each) and am amazed by how much black is on the pad after washing with a facial cleanser. I haven't tried the oil-free version, but these don't feel at all oily to me, so I don't see the need to switch. I absolutely LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: There are better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: I carefully read alot of reviews for this brand and other brands. I thought i was getting the holy grail of eye makeup remover pads. But it isn't. In short, I use a pad for each eye, they are smaller in diameter than you think. Then you have to rub and rub the pad to try and get all the mascara off. I still had mascara underneath my eyes on the skin. Not a pretty site. I will be looking elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Campbell-Skelly

customer_reviews.title: These suck
customer_reviews.text: I love Marcelle eye make up remover pads in the blue container but those were out of stock so I got these instead and I can’t stand them! They are oily and leave residue that I HAVE to wash off my eyes. They do not remove makeup as well as the ones in the blue container either. Save yourself some time and find the other ones. They work wonders and are back in stock!! Woot
customer_reviews.author: Weebs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sensitive to eyes, mild pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Got these in one of my monthly subscriptions and have not used anything since and never will again. Absolutely LOVE them and recommend them to anyone I know. Marcelle has become my favorite company as everything they make has made my skin better and just wonderful products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this make up remover
customer_reviews.text: mascara and eye shadow I wear then both.Marcelle make up remover takes it all off with a couple of swipes. This will last many months, but I will order this again when I run out. Love this make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: california girl

customer_reviews.title: The best makeup removing pads ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best makeup removing pads I've ever tried! They are not greasy and they take off waterproof eyeliner without rubbing your skin harshly around your eyes. Also they have good ingredients for those concerned about putting things on your skin. I will buy these over and over again! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: First time user; these work great!
customer_reviews.text: Used one side for removing waterproof eyeliner and eye bronze, the other side to remove blush. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: William Schoppert

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent eye makeup remover, especially for those with sensitive eyes. These were great at removing all my eye shadow/ liner/mascara, without leaving any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Old soul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, wonderful for the eyes, great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Got them in one of my monthly subscriptions and will never use anything else again. Have purchased numerous times and honestly everything from Marcelle is just wonderful. HIGHLY recommend these to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! Just big enough and moist enough to do the job. I just use one pad for both eyes. I am using other Marcelle products and love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoris

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, non irritating and textured to grab and wipe away
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Used Almay wipes before this. Same size and shape which was why I bought them initially, cause for travel you can just put a few into a ziplock and take along. They are even more gentle than the almay, never irritate my eyes and they have more texture that helps grab bits of mascara as the one I use pills up when being removed. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: This is the best eye makeup remover ever
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ever had an eyemakeup remover like this. All removed now if I could find a makeup remover that was at good everything I have tried only removes partial eye make up and regular make up highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. Trust

customer_reviews.title: The best eye makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands and I finally found the perfect remover. I love that it's not greasy and it does not bother my sensitive skin while removing all of my eye makeup effortlessly. I will be stocking up!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love these pads!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pads to remove my eye makeup. They are convenient and work great. I have never been disappointed with any Marcelle products.
customer_reviews.author: Victoris

customer_reviews.title: love these!!
customer_reviews.text: favorite makeup remover pads. i have extremely sensitive redness-prone skin and these are great, very soothing and removes mascara well
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I just started using them and they are soft enough and hard enough to take the make up off without scratching 😀. I am hoping they don't get dry before i am done using them. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cruelty free eye makeup removers
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and does not leave an oily feeling. These are the most effective I’ve found that are cruelty free and non oily.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Work Good but container dryed out fast....
customer_reviews.text: Worked good but container dryed out fast and Never left it open and always closed tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie's mommie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The only makeup removers I use! I’m glad they’re now offered on amazon for half the price I used to have to pay to buy them off of another site!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and skin and can't really use anything that you can find on the shelf in a store. This definitely gets the job done when removing eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective!
customer_reviews.text: These pads are gentle, yet they take all of one’s eye makeup off completely. Very good product and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGal

customer_reviews.title: but these are no where near as good. They leave a greasy feeling and your eyes ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the same eye cleansing pads I had before from Amazon, but these are no where near as good. They leave a greasy feeling and your eyes have to be rinsed after use whereas the others needed no rinsing. They do clean off eye makeup though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ishikawa

customer_reviews.title: Super sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye makeup remover. I have sensitive eyes and doesn't irritate them.
customer_reviews.author: Ag

customer_reviews.title: Removes eye makeup easily
customer_reviews.text: These are great for removing eye makeup, no hard rubbing or tugging to get it off. Also no irritation or stinging.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Buy me!
customer_reviews.text: The best eye makeup remover. 10xs better than Almay. The textured pad helps remove more makeup. Does not dry out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: These really work great! Remove my eye makeup and don’t irritate my eyes or leave them greasy.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner and eye makeup remover product.
customer_reviews.text: Dry pads. Expected it be moist. Added water so I could use product.
customer_reviews.author: Doodler

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these pads - not too large as in similar products. They do remove waterproof makeup but there is some work involved.
customer_reviews.author: Judy ODea

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof eye makeup remover I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Best waterproof eye makeup remover I've ever used. I have sensitive skin and eyes, and these pads never irritate. Best of all, they do not leave any oily residue behind, as so many others do. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: holmesdevotee

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been obsessed with this product since I found it on Birchbox a while ago. It has been hard to find in stock on that site and I was so happy to find it on Amazon. This is the only eye makeup remover I will use. It takes everything off super quickly and never ever irritates my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cardozo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price point, but I need several pads to get my eye makeup all the way off.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: These pads are ok! They are really thin so not much product, it takes 3 of them to remove my eye make up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Great for under the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love the quick clean up I use it for under the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Moulder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. No oily residue and removes eye makeup easily without too much rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kekepe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I only wear a little eye makeup, so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Removes make up very well. I really appreciate that it has no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenza

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. I love that I can also travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emcd23

customer_reviews.title: Will remove all eye makeup, the best eye makeup wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best eye makeup remover wipes I have ever used! I highly recommend these and I will repurchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Knouff

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Removes eye makeup quickly and gently. No irritation to my sensitive, contact wearing eyes, and still able to take off full mascara and eye liner.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cline

customer_reviews.title: Eye makeup remover pads
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to find a product that truly gently removes eye makeup. I buy these because I haven't found anything better. But years ago I used a product (no longer available) that worked much better. With these I am still having to rub in order to get the makeup off - the pads seem too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Roston

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth removal, you really have to scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear a lot of eye makeup, mostly just eyeliner and brow powder. I feel like I have to really scrub to get the eye gunk off. I can't imagine how this product would work if I was wearing mascara or waterproof liner. I'm surprised how many ultra-positive reviews it has gotten. I'll be sticking to Neutrogena's eye makeup remover... I haven't found anything that works as good.
customer_reviews.author: Shree

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable 😊
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sensitive eyes. I’ve tried MANY makeup remover wipes and they all made my eyes burn really bad for DAYS. These fixed my issue! They do leave a little oily residue but I don’t mind, it feels kind of nice imo. If you don’t like it, simply wipe it off with a tissue or wet rag 😊
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get through regular non waterproof eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t waste my money on these! I don’t use waterproof eye makeup and these couldn’t even break through that easily. What a waste!? Would give no stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: JRAA

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied with the Marcelle Oil-Free eye makeup remover pads. It works totally well. As a result, I am ordering more. Many thanks to all of you at Marcelle.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Will purchase over and over. I hate greasy feeling removers. This doesn’t not feel that way at all. It takes two sometimes to get all the makeup off my eyes so a bit expensive but still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect but it’s not the best in removing makeup. And it dries up quickly. 2 stars for size and removing most but not all of the makeup
customer_reviews.author: Sajrudin

customer_reviews.title: Itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these made my eyes extremely itchy after I used them one time, I had to wash off the residue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mirandi

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: love the textured pads. Works great and does not burn or sting eyes. Gentle but very effective in removing even waterproof eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: linnie

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This works well. It did not bother my eyes at all, it felt very light and it did remove my mascara easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle-Rene'

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderful. Love how they feel. They seem to make around my eyes appear softer. Will conoto buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: guy who buys things

customer_reviews.title: Oily and rough
customer_reviews.text: Oily and very rough on the delicate skin around the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle
customer_reviews.text: Very Gentle and does the job well removing eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Does not burn your eyes and really remove well.
customer_reviews.author: guy who buys things

customer_reviews.title: Keep out of eyes, seems to do okay job using several.
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay I had to use several, sort of oily.
customer_reviews.author: 2Di4amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle on eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Takes most of mascara off but not all. It works well enough that I am on my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Heywood

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: The best eye makeup remover I’ve found. Tricia San Diego
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.text: No strong smell. Works great. No skin pain. Removed makeup amazingly well. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I love how great it does as a remover. My go-to from now on
customer_reviews.author: Kara Z.

customer_reviews.title: I love these make up removers
customer_reviews.text: I love these make up removers. I have chronic dry eye and they remove make up with agitating my eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Reed

customer_reviews.title: It did the job, but the pads were thin ...
customer_reviews.text: It did the job, but the pads were thin and scratchy. IMO - they are much to rough to be used on the delicate eye area.
customer_reviews.author: nachotime

customer_reviews.title: I love these eye makeup remover pads and have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these eye makeup remover pads and have been using them for a couple years now. I have really sensitive skin and I've never had any issues with this product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous Jen

product_meta.title: Marcelle Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover Pads, 85 Pads
product_meta.description: Style Name:Oil-FreeThis non-irritating and refreshing formula for sensitive eyes gently removes eye makeup, including long-wearing makeup, without leaving any greasy residue.
feature_bullets: OIL-FREE EYE MAKEUP REMOVER: These thick, soft dual-phase eye makeup remover pads help easily remove waterproof & long-lasting eye & lip makeup. Non-irritating formula is ideal for sensitive eyes.
GENTLE & EFFECTIVE: Our Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover pads use micellar technology to quickly dissolve all traces of long-wearing eye & lip makeup, including waterproof mascara. 100% hypoallergenic.

BRAND STORY: Founded in 1874, Marcelle delivers hypoallergenic, fragrance-free & dermatologist tested products. Our brand is synonymous with skin health without sacrificing the glamorous side of beauty.

MARCELLE GROUP: Discover our four complementary brands. Hypoallergenic & fragrance-free Marcelle, empowering & colorful Annabelle, prestigious & innovative Lise Watier & our men’s line, CW Beggs & Sons.
BEAUTY WITHOUT COMPROMISE: Try the full line of Marcelle products including mascara, eye makeup remover pads, cleansing gel, 8-in-1 power serum, BB cream, eyeliner, lipstick, and lip gloss.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
